item.title: 在绿色电力供应蓬勃发展之后，中国正在加大电网支出
item.description: 在掀起史上最大规模的可再生能源热潮之后，中国现在正付出代价，以确保所有清洁能源都能进入家庭和企业。【原文：After launching the biggest boom in renewable power in history, China is now paying-up to make sure all that clean energy can get to homes and businesses.】

item.title: 印度快餐业者希望在即将到来的预算案中获得税收减免
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 特朗普、马斯克与微软首席执行官讨论人工智能和网络安全问题
item.description: 微软公司的萨蒂亚-纳德拉（Satya Nadella）在与美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）和埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）会面时讨论了人工智能和网络安全问题，成为向新政府示好的最新一位科技行业领袖。【原文：Microsoft Corp.’s Satya Nadella discussed AI and cybersecurity during a meeting with US President-elect Donald Trump and Elon Musk, becoming the latest tech industry chieftain to make overtures to the new administration.】

item.title: 澳大利亚人为何冷落现金
item.description: 2018年5月23日星期三，澳大利亚悉尼，澳大利亚一百元和五十元纸币摆放在一起拍照。澳大利亚央行行长菲利普-洛威（Philip Lowe）上周表示，澳大利亚和中国可以共同成为支持开放的全球贸易体系的力量。摄影师：Brendon Thorne/Bloomberg【原文：Australian one hundred dollar and fifty dollar banknotes are arranged for a photograph in Sydney, Australia, on Wednesday, May 23, 2018. Australia's central bank chief Philip Lowe said last week that his nation and China together can be a force supportive of an open global trading system. Photographer: Brendon Thorne/Bloomberg】

item.title: 日本央行认为 1 月加息的可能性很大，除非特朗普带来惊喜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士称，只要唐纳德-特朗普入主白宫不会引发太多负面意外，日本央行官员认为下周加息的可能性很大。【原文：Bank of Japan officials see a good chance of an interest rate hike next week as long as the arrival of Donald Trump at the White House doesn’t trigger too many negative surprises, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 报告称财政部黑客专注于制裁和情报工作
item.description: 据彭博新闻社查阅的一份机构报告称，中国国家支持的黑客入侵了美国财政部的 400 多台笔记本电脑和台式电脑，尤其对负责制裁、国际事务和情报工作的工作人员和高级领导人的电脑感兴趣。【原文：Chinese state-sponsored hackers who breached the US Treasury Department got into more than 400 laptop and desktop computers, taking particular interest in the machines of staff and senior leaders focused on sanctions, international affairs and intelligence, according to an agency report reviewed by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚中央银行新任命可能转向鸽派
item.description: 哥伦比亚总统古斯塔沃-彼得罗（Gustavo Petro）任命了两位学者为哥伦比亚中央银行的成员，这可能会改变在多快降息问题上存在分歧的董事会的力量平衡。【原文：Colombian President Gustavo Petro named two academics to the nation’s central bank, potentially changing the balance of forces on a board which is split over how fast to cut interest rates.】

item.title: 加拿大八大资本公司将关闭，Stifel 抢滩银行家市场
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，加拿大投资交易商 Eight Capital Corp. 正在逐步关闭，其许多高级职员将前往 Stifel Financial Corp.【原文：Canadian investment dealer Eight Capital Corp. is winding down and many of its top staff are headed to Stifel Financial Corp., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 新加坡芯片设备制造商 GVT 称人工智能热潮远未结束
item.description: 随着美光科技公司（Micron Technology Inc.）和英飞凌科技公司（Infineon Technologies AG）等巨头在亚洲建立新工厂，半导体设备制造商大唐创业科技有限公司（Grand Venture Technology Ltd.）正试图将全球对先进存储芯片的需求转化为成为主要供应商的机会。【原文：Semiconductor equipment maker Grand Venture Technology Ltd. is trying to turn the world’s hunger for advanced memory chips into a chance to become a major supplier, as giants from Micron Technology Inc. to Infineon Technologies AG build new factories in Asia.】

item.title: 散户投资者喜爱的股票在印度大跌中处于领先地位
item.description: 印度市场近期的大跌对散户投资者的伤害比对机构买家的伤害更大，因为对被大肆炒作的股票的押注出现了变数。【原文：India’s recent market selloff is hurting retail investors more than institutional buyers as bets on widely hyped stocks turn sour.】

item.title: 越南的贸易顺差使越南盾陷入特朗普的关税漩涡
item.description: 越南盾可能会测试新的低点，因为该国对美国不断增长的贸易顺差使其面临即将上任的唐纳德-特朗普政府征收定向关税的风险。【原文：The Vietnamese dong is likely to test new lows as the country’s growing trade surplus with the US puts it at risk of targeted tariffs from the incoming Donald Trump administration.】

item.title: 前印度央行行长称印度央行必须避免过度干预外汇市场
item.description: 印度前央行行长表示，印度央行必须避免过度干预外汇市场，并允许企业适应波动。【原文：India’s central bank must avoid excessive intervention in the foreign exchange market and allow companies to adjust to volatility, according to a former central bank chief.】

item.title: 韩国央行意外按兵不动以求稳定
item.description: 韩国央行周四出人意料地维持政策不变，面对政治动荡和经济放缓选择保持冷静，而韩国政府则试图通过自身努力来支撑消费者情绪。【原文：The Bank of Korea unexpectedly held its policy unchanged Thursday, opting to stay cool in the face of political turbulence and a slowing economy, while the government attempts its own efforts to shore up consumer sentiment.】

item.title: 欧洲央行森特诺称欧元区通胀处于可控范围内
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员马里奥-森特诺（Mario Centeno）表示，欧元区的通货膨胀已得到控制。【原文：Inflation in the euro-area is under control, European Central Bank Governing Council member Mario Centeno said.】

item.title: 澳大利亚失业率保持低位，招聘人数持续增加
item.description: 澳大利亚 12 月份的失业率保持在较低水平，经济延续了连续招聘增长的势头，凸显了劳动力市场对高利率的不同寻常的适应力。【原文：Australia’s unemployment rate remained low in December as the economy extended a streak of hiring gains, underlining the labor market’s unusual resilience to elevated interest rates.】

item.title: 国债 "死亡螺旋 "风险被外国基金一扫而光
item.description: 无论你是与欧洲最大的基金经理、澳大利亚的大型养老基金，还是日本现金充裕的保险公司交谈，在谈到美国国债时，你都会听到一个响亮的信息：美国国债仍然难以战胜。【原文：Whether you’re speaking with Europe’s largest money manager, Australia’s giant pension funds, or a cash-rich insurer in Japan, there’s a resounding message you’ll hear when it comes to US Treasuries: They are still hard to beat.】

item.title: 环球音乐计划出售美国股票换取潘兴广场股份
item.description: 环球音乐集团（Universal Music Group NV）已同意计划在 9 月 15 日前出售美国股票，以履行与亿万富翁比尔-阿克曼（Bill Ackman）旗下对冲基金潘兴广场（Pershing Square）达成的协议。【原文：Universal Music Group NV has agreed to plan a US share sale by Sept. 15, in order to fulfill an agreement with billionaire Bill Ackman’s hedge fund Pershing Square.】

item.title: 比特币突破 100,000 美元关口，对美联储政策路径的忧虑有所缓解
item.description: 比特币创下新年最大涨幅，因为令人欣慰的美国通胀数据重燃了对美联储进一步降息的押注，从而提振了全球市场。【原文：Bitcoin notched its biggest gain of the new year as reassuring US inflation figures revived bets on further interest-rate cuts by the Federal Reserve, lifting global markets.】

item.title: 美国通胀数据提振降息乐观情绪，黄金保持涨势
item.description: 在美国通胀率意外放缓使美联储今年降息的预期升温之后，黄金保持了连续两天的上涨势头。【原文：Gold held a two-day advance, after a surprise slowdown in US inflation revived expectations for Federal Reserve rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 印尼意外降息加剧债券市场不确定性
item.description: 印尼央行本周降息打破了几乎整个市场的预期，加深了政府债券收益率的不确定性。【原文：Indonesia’s central bank defied the expectations of practically the entire market when it cut interest rates this week, deepening a period of uncertainty for government bond yields.】

item.title: 随着欧洲痛苦的缓解，德国的困境水平将上升
item.description: 德国正在成为欧洲企业困境的异类，因为其出口驱动型经济正在与全球需求疲软和持续的价格压力作斗争。【原文：Germany is becoming an outlier for corporate distress in Europe as its export-driven economy battles against faltering global demand and persistent price pressures.】

item.title: 手机初创公司 Nothing 获得融资，终身销售额突破 10 亿美元
item.description: 据知情人士透露，由谷歌风险投资部门和 iPod 创造者托尼-法德尔（Tony Fadell）支持的智能手机制造商 Nothing 正在寻求筹集至少 1 亿美元的资金，以扩大其业务。【原文：Nothing, a smartphone maker backed by Google’s venture arm and iPod creator Tony Fadell, is seeking to raise at least $100 million in funding to expand its operations, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 特斯拉的亚洲竞争对手在印度新兴电动汽车市场中拔得头筹
item.description: 铃木汽车公司印度分公司、比亚迪股份有限公司和 VinFast Auto Ltd.等汽车制造商正准备在新德里展示其新型电动汽车，因为对这个增长最快的主要汽车市场的争夺愈演愈烈，而特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.【原文：Suzuki Motor Corp.’s India unit, BYD Co. and VinFast Auto Ltd. are among carmakers gearing to showcase their new electric vehicles in New Delhi as the fight intensifies for the fastest-growing major automobile market where Tesla Inc. is conspicuous by its absence.】

item.title: 国际能源署（IEA）警告俄罗斯采取限制措施，石油库存减少，石油涨势扩大
item.description: 由于全球供应风险不断增加，以及美国商业原油库存创下 2021 年以来最长的连续降幅，石油延续了年初的强劲升势。【原文：Oil extended a powerful early-year advance on mounting risks to global supplies, and as commercial crude inventories in the US posted their longest run of declines since 2021.】

item.title: 仿人机器人制造商 Neura Robotics 获 1.2 亿美元融资
item.description: Neura Robotics 是一家生产 "能看、能听、能触摸 "的机器人的德国初创公司，该公司已融资 1.2 亿美元，并表示将用于提高机器感知和处理信息的能力。【原文：Neura Robotics, a German startup that manufactures robots that can “see, hear and touch,” has raised $120 million, which the company said it will use to improve the machines’ ability to perceive and process information.】

item.title: Blackstone 寻求以 30 亿美元出售鲍勃-迪伦、阿黛尔歌曲版权
item.description: 知情人士称，Blackstone Inc. 已聘请财务顾问探讨歌曲版权的出售事宜，其中包括鲍勃-迪伦 (Bob Dylan)、阿黛尔 (Adele) 和阿丽亚娜-格兰德 (Ariana Grande) 的音乐作品，该公司预计这些作品的售价将达到或超过 30 亿美元。【原文：Blackstone Inc. has hired financial advisers to explore the sale of song rights, including music from Bob Dylan, Adele and Ariana Grande, that it expects to fetch $3 billion or more, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 印度炙手可热的初创企业的衰落正在消灭美国的债务人
item.description: 在华尔街，这是个很容易出售的项目：它是印度历史上最有价值的初创公司，是一家在硅谷享有盛誉的科技公司，它的创始人魅力非凡，并憧憬着主宰在线教育行业，这似乎必将成为 "大流行 "后的下一个风口。【原文：On Wall Street, it was an easy sell: The most valuable startup in India’s history, a tech company with Silicon Valley cachet, a charismatic founder and visions of dominating the online-education business that seemed sure to be one of the post-pandemic’s next big things.】

item.title: 美国通胀后亚洲股市有望上涨：市场综述
item.description: 在新数据显示美国核心通胀率降温，使美联储今年降息的前景依然存在之后，亚洲股市将跟随华尔街走高。【原文：Shares in Asia were set to follow Wall Street higher after new data showed core inflation cooling in the US, keeping alive the prospect of Federal Reserve rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 如果特朗普先下手为强，加拿大准备对 1050 亿美元美国产品加征关税
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，加拿大已经拟定了一份初步清单，列出了如果当选总统唐纳德-特朗普决定对加拿大商品征收关税，加拿大将征收关税的1500亿加元（1050亿美元）美国制造商品。【原文：Canada has drawn up an initial list of C$150 billion ($105 billion) of US-manufactured items that it would hit with tariffs if President-elect Donald Trump decides to levy tariffs against Canadian goods, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 漫画蓬勃发展，Webtoon 投资日本网络漫画工作室 No.
item.description: 作为网络漫画公司全球扩张战略的一部分，Webtoon Entertainment Inc.【原文：Webtoon Entertainment Inc. is investing in a Japanese webcomic and manga studio as part of the online comic company’s global expansion strategy.】
